block-1.text-1: The project's own infrastructure allows you to use the free capacity of server equipment in order to make a profit for the company, to create a reserve fund for Project 202 and provide the project with fiat funds and issue your own stablecoins P202USD, P202EUR, P202KRW, which are provided with real money in a ratio of 1 to 1.
block-1.text-2: Storage and maintenance of equipment takes place in data centers distributed around the world, without causing such huge damage to the environment as mining at home or in an industrial way.

block-2.title: Our mission
block-2.text-1: Business model with real server infrastructure and business
block-2.text-2: Due to the fact that when building a server architecture, high-deficit components are not used (the structure is based on a high-performance bundle of drives, RAM and processors), building servers and including them in the P202 network will not be associated with the problem of supplying other components, such as video cards and other graphics accelerators
block-2.text-3: Thus, when connected to the network, the validator will not face problems of procurement, installation and configuration, and high liquidity will allow it to use previously idle capacities of its equipment
block-2.text-4: We host servers in key nodes of the network
block-2.text-5: This allows the maximum number of people to have the opportunity to join our network with their equipment and get guaranteed earnings at the expense of their capacities
block-2.text-6: By 2023, we plan to connect more than 4,000 users, by 2024 - to increase this number to 28,000

block-3.title: Key features
block-3.subtitle: We want to ensure the value of this idea in the digital embodiment of the token

card-1.title: Low fees and transaction latency
card-1.description: A network of distributed data centers in highly loaded network nodes

card-2.title: Protection of coin holders and validators
card-2.description: The distribution of tokens does not imply an additional issue

card-3.title: Stable growing shortage of tokens
card-3.description: Burning toxins when used, which makes the remaining coins more valuable

card-4.title: We don't invent bicycles
card-4.description: The Solana-based blockchain is a fork of the most optimized blockchain in the world

block-4.title: Our tokenomic
block-4.subtitle: We distribute all tokens during the first 4 years of the blockchain operation
block-4.card-text-1: The main share of tokens will be issued for infrastructure maintenance, exchanges and transactions, and payment of remuneration to validators. These tokens will belong to the blockchain smart contract
block-4.card-text-2: These tokens will belong to a smart contract and will be available for circulation on exchanges from the very beginning
block-4.card-text-3: Tokens of the team and founders.
block-4.card-text-4: Think about what you need it for
block-4.card-text-5: Think about what you need it for

graph.title: Unfreezing tokens in shares by stages

text-1.row-1: Defrosting of 50% of the team's tokens.
text-1.row-2: Defrosting of 50% of the team's tokens.

text-2.row-1: Defrosting of 50% of the team's tokens.
text-2.row-2: Defrosting of 50% of the team's tokens.

text-4.row-1: Defrosting of 50% of the team's tokens.
text-4.row-2: Defrosting of 50% of the team's tokens.

block-4.text-bottom: In addition to issuing its own cryptocurrency, the project has a registered company and plans to earn income in fiat currencies.

list.elem-7: Infrastructure for online broadcasts in 4K and 8K
